title: Typing Indicator Component
description: Build an animated typing indicator that shows when other users are typing.
instructions:
Create a TypingIndicator widget that displays animated dots when someone is typing:

1. Show three animated dots that bounce in sequence
2. Display the typing user's avatar and name
3. Handle multiple users typing simultaneously
4. Animate in/out when typing starts/stops
5. Integrate with the chat stream to show/hide automatically

Requirements:
- Create smooth dot bouncing animation using AnimationController
- Stagger the animations so dots bounce in sequence
- Support showing 'User is typing...' or 'User1, User2 are typing...'
- Animate the indicator's appearance with a fade and slide
- Auto-hide after a timeout if no updates received
expectedOutput: A polished typing indicator with smooth dot animations and proper text formatting for multiple users.

hints.text: Use three AnimationControllers with Tween<double>(begin: 0, end: -8) for the bounce effect. Stagger their start times by 150-200ms.
Wrap the entire indicator in an AnimatedOpacity or AnimatedSlide widget to smoothly show/hide when typingUsers changes.
For the dot animation, use AnimatedBuilder with Transform.translate to move each dot vertically based on its animation value.
